name: For Two - game for lovers
description:
Finally, the most popular quiz for lovers "For Two - game for lovers" is now available in your phone. The format of the game will allow lovers to reveal themselves to each other completely! "For Two" - is ideal game for couple!

Dear players, the development team thanks you for choosing the game «For Two». If you are a couple in love and want to diversify joint evenings, then this game is for you. The game will help you to get to know each other better, will give you the opportunity to be liberated, and, undoubtedly, will improve your mood. For this, we made a lot of interesting questions and tasks. Have a good game!

RULES OF THE GAME:
Each partner has the task to score the first more points to win a prize at the end of the game. The winner receives the award, and the loser performs the written task. Starts the game girl. During the game, you will one by one answer questions and perform tasks for two. If you correctly answer a question or accurately perform a task, you get 1 score. The winner is the one who will win the winning number of score first. Good luck
